revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E3200 |revision=v1 |upc=745883592388 |asin=B004T9RR7C |est_release_date=04/04/2011 |fcc_date=03/31/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E3200 |ic_id=3839A-E3200 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47186B0 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128BUFG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSC-5G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47186B0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43236 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=AdvancedTomato, Tomato (Shibby), Tomato RAF (Victek), |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=58:6D:8F,C0:C1:C0 |oui_eth=58:6D:8F,C0:C1:C0 }} {{TagLine|High Performance Dual-Band N Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E3200}}
E3200 v1.0 serial numbers appear to start with '''10B10'''. :{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_E3200}}
*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31499-new-to-the-charts-cisco-linksys-e3200-high-performance-dual-band-n-router Addition to SmallNetBuilder's Router Charts]
*[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=138558 ''Linksys E3200'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :Pictures, part numbers, test build and screenshot on the 2nd page :[5GHz not working due to lack of driver for the USB BCM4323x chips] :58:6D:8F OUI in a label shot in this thread (page 10)
Despite the fact that both chips used in the device are 2x2:2, :they are using both in a 3 antenna configuration.
===Supported third-party firmware notes=== This device is supported by... *''[https://advancedtomato.com AdvancedTomato] builds *''Shibby'''s [http://tomato.groov.pl/download/K26RT-N/ K26RT-N] '''Tomato''' builds *''Victek'''s [http://victek.is-a-geek.com '''Tomato RAF (Victek)'''] builds
